content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a response from the AI suggesting the 'replace_in_file' command with specified filename, old text, new text, and occurrence index. However, when I attempted to execute the command, I received a message stating that there were no matches found for the old text in the specified file. I requested the AI to list files in a specific directory. The AI responded with an empty list.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: Error: read_file /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/<filename> failed: no such file or directory', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "<command_line>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_hyperlinks", "args": {"url": "<url>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_file returned: Error: Invalid file type. Only .py files are allowed.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "<directory>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command list_files returned: []', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: Error: read_file /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/<filename> failed: no such file or directory', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "<command_line>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command append_to_file returned: Text appended successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>", "old_text": "<old_text>", "new_text": "<new_text>", "occurrence_index": "<occurrence_index>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: No matches found for <old_text> in /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/<filename>', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "<directory>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command list_files returned: []', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: <text>', type='action_result')]
